title: How to Remove the Timestamp on WhatsApp

steps.title: Launch WhatsApp on your device.
steps.content: Launch WhatsApp on your device. Locate the icon that looks like a white telephone in a green talk bubble. Tap on it to open.

steps.title: Tap on "Settings."
steps.content: Tap on "Settings." This option is located on the navigation bar.

steps.title: Disable the Message Timestamp.
steps.content: Disable the Message Timestamp. Select Chat Settings, locate the Message Timestamp option, and then toggle the switch to disable it.

steps.title: Disable the Last Seen Timestamp.
steps.content: Disable the Last Seen Timestamp. Tap on "Advanced," locate the Last Seen Timestamp, and then toggle the switch to disable it.
